overview: After the death of her old uncle, Monica suddenly find herself to rule an import-export company. She knows nothing about this job and she trusts in the staff of people that have been working beside her uncle. But soon Monica will discover that the commercial society is only a covering for illegal traffic and dirty affairs. She will be on the horn of a dilemma, and she will have to take a crucial decision: to go on the path of illegality or totally change her life.
title: Crossed Destiny
